interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Cake
Review Date: 2018/09/30
Store: Sam Worthington  (Actor),     Jennifer Aniston  (Actor),     Daniel Barnz  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, All Fox Titles
Product Description: ["Claire Simmons (Jennifer Aniston) is in pain. Her physical pain is evident in the scars that line her body and the way she carries herself, wincing with each tentative step. She's no good at hiding her emotional pain either. Blunt to the point of searing insult, Claire's anger seethes out of her with nearly every interaction. She has driven away her husband, her friends - even her chronic-pain support group has kicked her out. The only one left in Claire's otherwise solitary existence is her housekeeper-cum-caretaker, Silvana (Academy Award nominee Adriana Barraza), who barely tolerates her boss' need for liquor and prescription pills. But the suicide of Nina (Academy Award nominee Anna Kendrick), one of Claire's fellow chronic-pain group members, prompts another fixation. In pursuing questions about the death of a woman she barely knew, Claire explores the boundaries between life and death, abandonment and heartbreak, danger and salvation. As she inserts herself into the lives of Nina's husband (Sam Worthington) and the son Nina left behind, Claire just might find salvation."]
Average Rating: 4.2

The Fate of the Furious
Vin Diesel  (Actor, Producer),     Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson  (Actor),     F. Gary Gray  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure
["Now that Dominic Toretto (Vin Diesel) and Letty Ortiz (Michelle Rodriguez) are on their honeymoon, and Brian (Paul Walker) and Mia (Jordana Brewster) have retired from the game, and the rest of the crew has been exonerated, the globetrotting team has found a semblance of a normal life. But when a mysterious woman seduces Dom into the world of crime he can't seem to escape, and a betrayal of those closest to him, they will face trials that will test them as never before. From the shores of Cuba and the streets of New York City to the icy plains off the arctic Barents Sea, the elite force will crisscross the globe to stop an anarchist from unleashing chaos on the world's stage, and to bring home the man who made them a family. —harpreet phamber"]

Trolls DHD
Kendrick, Anna  (Actor),     Timberlake, Justin  (Actor)    Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Movies
["From the creators of Shrek comes the most smart, funny, irreverent animated comedy of the year, DreamWorks' Trolls. This holiday season, enter a colorful, wondrous world populated by hilariously unforgettable characters and discover the story of the overly optimistic Trolls, with a constant song on their lips, and the comically pessimistic Bergens, who are only happy when they have trolls in their stomach. Featuring original music from Justin Timberlake, and soon-to-be classic mash-ups of songs from other popular artists, the film stars the voice talents of Anna Kendrick, Justin Timberlake, Russell Brand, James Corden, Kunal Nayyar, Ron Funches, Icona Pop, Gwen Stefani, and many more. DreamWorks' TROLLS is a fresh, broad comedy filled with music, heart and hair-raising adventures. In November of 2016, nothing can prepare you for our new Troll world."]

Sausage Party
Conrad Vernon  (Director, Producer),     Greg Tiernan  (Director)    Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
['In this CG-animated movie, one sausage leads a group of supermarket products on a quest to discover the truth about their existence and what really happens when they become chosen to leave the grocery store. The film features the vocal talents of some of today’s best comedy stars – Seth Rogen, Kristen Wiig, Jonah Hill, Bill Hader, Michael Cera, James Franco, Danny McBride, Craig Robinson, Paul Rudd, Nick Kroll, David Krumholtz, Edward Norton, and Salma Hayek.']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to enjoy classic movies from the 1980s and 1990s while exploring contemporary genres, particularly animated films. They appreciate nostalgia-driven content and are increasingly drawn to family-friendly features but maintain openness to diverse genres.

- **Genre Interest:** The user favors classic films, music-related content, animated comedies, and action-adventure narratives. Their recent interaction shows a discerning approach to adult-themed content, reflecting a growing caution.

- **Format Choice:** The user remains committed to DVDs for their collectible aspects and enhanced features, reinforcing their preference for physical media.

- **Review Style:** While historically providing succinct, positive feedback, the user’s latest review indicates a shift toward critical evaluation of content that fails to meet expectations, particularly regarding authenticity and realism.

- **Actor Affinity:** The user shows a strong appreciation for films featuring recognizable talent, particularly in animated films, demonstrating enthusiasm for well-known actors.

- **Family-Friendly Content:** Though they enjoy family-friendly options, the user’s recent feedback suggests a heightened awareness of the appropriateness of content, as they expressed disappointment with adult-rated films lacking relatability and realism.

Overall, the user’s profile reflects a commitment to classic nostalgia and a deeper consideration of content suitability as they navigate the balance between family-friendly viewing and adult themes.
